question:
Consider the following statements about the 15th Finance commission:
  1. Article 280 of the Constitution provides for the establishment of the Finance Commission
  2. Ashok Lahiri has been appointed as the chairperson of the 15th commission
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. The Finance Commission is set up under Article 280 of the Constitution<u>. Second statement is incorrect</u> because Nand Kishore Singh has been appointed as the chairperson of the commission. Ashok Lahiri is the full-time member of the 15th commission. The 15<sup>th</sup> Finance Commission will use the 2011 population census for the devolution of taxes from central government to the States.
